metadata.dc:author: Carrillo, N
metadata.dc:description: Giant duodenal ulcers have a high mortality. The clinical, radiological and endoscopic appearance are described. The treatment of choice in patients with giant duodenal ulcer is surgical, the continuous infusion of H-2 blockers is useful before the surgical procedure.
metadata.dc:title: Ulcera duodenal gigante.
[Giant duodenal ulcer].
